mapper.sql: a.id as "id", a.login_name as "loginName", a.password as "password", a.no as "no", a.username as "username", a.email as "email", a.phone as "phone", a.mobile as "mobile", a.user_type as "userType", a.photo as "photo", a.update_date as "updateDate", a.create_date as "createDate", a.remarks as "remarks", a.del_flag as "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user( id, login_name, password, no, username, email, phone, mobile, user_type, photo, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{loginName}, #{password}, #{no}, #{username}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{mobile}, #{userType}, #{photo}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
